text: Nina Bawden (19 January 1925 â€“ 22 August 2012) was a British children's writer. She wrote many books, including On the Run (1964) and Carrie's War (1973). Bawden was born in Ilford, Essex. On 22 August 2012 she died at her home in London. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2012 deaths Category:English children's writers Category:People from Ilford Category:Writers from Essex
